name: test_policy_before_future
description:
Test that it's NOT possible to mint tokens when the policy is not met.

        The "before" slot is in the future and the given range is invalid.

    def _cleanup_dead_clusters(self, cget_status: ClusterGetStatus) -> None:
        """Cleanup if the selected cluster instance failed to start."""
        # move on to other cluster instance
